Name: Electric Load Data

Description.String: Type a load growth rate (%) for each year. Each year's growth rate applies to the total annual load in Year 1.

Tool Tip.String: Click Edit Array to import time series electric load data.

Description.String: The electric load power is the average power over the time interval.  For hourly load data, this is equivalent to entering energy usage in each hour in kWh.

Caption.String: These monthly and annual values are calculated from the hourly or subhourly load profile and shown here for reference.
Scale electric load profile to monthly usage
Adjust Load Profile to Monthly Usage

Electric load data describes the electricity usage of a building or facility for electricity bill calculations. Enter or import an hourly or subhourly load profile and use the adjustment options to scale the profile or to account for annual load growth. See Help for details.

Tool Tip.String: Type a fixed scaling factor to adjust the hourly load profile. Type a '1' for no scaling.
